paragraph.paragraph: The Titled Window item is a new Eiffel Class, TITLED_WINDOW that represents a Vision2 titled window, inheriting EV_TITLED_WINDOW.
Default feature clauses are contained within the class text, and three pre-defined features are contained:

list.item: initialize - Redefined from EV_TITLED_WINDOW, this feature performs the initialization of the window, and any custom initialization required for your window, can be added here.initialize is executed as a result of calling default_create on the window.
is_in_default_state - Is the window in the correct default state after initialization? If you wish to check the default state of your window, add code to perform this here.

close_requested - Destroys the window. Connected to the close_request_actions of the window during initialize. The close_request_actions are fired when a user attempts to closethe window, and if you wish to override the default behavior, add your code to this feature.
